title: Create a Demolition Plan
description: An old structure needs to be demolished. An engineer must create a safe demolition plan.

tasks.description: Retrieve the original construction drawings for the structure to understand how it was built.
tasks.expected_outcome: The engineer finds the old drawings to analyze the structure.

tasks.description: Develop a step-by-step demolition sequence that ensures stability at all stages.
tasks.expected_outcome: The engineer creates a detailed plan for deconstruction.

tasks.description: Document the plan, including required equipment and safety precautions, and submit it for review.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a formal demolition plan document and submits it for approval.
